title: Momwe Imagwirira Ntchito - Orbital Temple
heading: Mmene Imagwirira Ntchito
intro: Ntchito ya Orbital Temple ili ndi zinthu zitatu zolumikizana zomwe zimagwirira ntchito limodzi kutumiza mayina kukachisi mumlengalenga.
paragraph1: Satellite imazungulira dziko lapansi pamtunda wa makilomita pafupifupi 525, ndikusunga mayina mu kukumbukira kwake. Masiteshoni apansi amalumikizana ndi satelayiti panthawi yodutsa, kutumiza mayina omwe anthu adatumiza kudzera pa webusayiti.
paragraph2: Mukatumiza dzina, limalumikizana ndi mzere ndipo lidzatumizidwa ku satellite pakadutsanso. Mudzalandira chitsimikizo cha imelo dzina lanu litakwezedwa bwino ku Orbital Temple.
